experience.details: Working with a medium sized team to provide support for an already existing e-commerce platform, performing bug fixes and planning new features by working with the Business Analyst and Development team.

Collaborated with the team and client to achieve common goals. Also, solved problems on a regular basis and performed system design for the assigned project. Additionally, performed DevOps related tasks. Worked on an IoT project where IoT devices collect data by analyzing any form of liquid, store it, process it and visualize in real-time. Where, the sensors and their features are provided via subscription to clients.

Worked with .NET 6, Azure Cosmos DB and other Microsoft Azure services such as Azure Web PubSub, Azure EventHub and Azure AD B2C. Also, learned software development best practices and application of agile methodologies.
